item.title: 参议员约翰-巴拉索（John Barrasso）宣布，他将寻求参议院共和党二号领导人的职位--这打破了人们长期以来对他将竞争少数党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）最高职位的预期。
item.description:
Sen. John Barrasso has announced that he's seeking the No. 2 Senate GOP leadership position — bucking long-held expectations that he'd vie for Minority Leader Mitch McConnell's top spot. https://t.co/iYVGPzIEmx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 五届艾迪塔罗德雪橇犬赛冠军得主达拉斯-西维（Dallas Seavey）被迫向一头 "愤怒的驼鹿 "开枪并开膛破肚。
item.description:
Five-time Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race champ Dallas Seavey was forced to fatally shoot and gut what he described as an "angry moose" after the animal became entangled with his team of dogs, according to officials of the Alaska competition. https://t.co/irIVX3oFk9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 官员说，新的视频显示，密歇根州一家电子烟分销公司发生猛烈爆炸，一名 19 岁的少年在四分之一英里外丧生。
item.description:
New video shows the fiery explosion at a vaping distributing company in Michigan that killed a 19-year-old a quarter mile away, officials say.

Fire officials say the teen was struck in the head and killed by a canister sent flying by the blast. https://t.co/GPerOXg2jJ pic.twitter.com/R4H0CiLAkZ

item.title: 有六人因涉嫌从中国走私数千磅生鹅肠和鸭肠并最终运到纽约市销售给餐馆和消费者而被捕。

item.title: 据警方称，在纽约西巴比伦的两个地方发现了更多的人体遗骸，一周前，在长岛的一个公园里发现了属于两个人的断肢。

item.title: 美国国家气象局说，暴雨横扫该州，给部分地区带来暴雨、强风和冰雹，新奥尔良市中心的道路宛如河流。
item.description:
The roads in downtown New Orleans resembled rivers after heavy rain caused flash flooding in parts of the city.

Storms pushed across the state, bringing heavy rainfall, strong winds and hail to parts of the area, the NWS said. https://t.co/rdJQaBHo7M pic.twitter.com/QsMHHdy5OD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024
